changeSet.author: doncoffee
changeSet.sql: create table `confectionery-store`.sweets ( sweets_id int auto_increment primary key, composition varchar(255) null, price double null, type varchar(255) null, weight double null, brand_id int null, store_id int null, supplier_id int null, constraint FK3cto5qsqu5o54kk0ec4bgs4jh foreign key (supplier_id) references `confectionery-store`.supplier (store_id), constraint FKjc8m2tlgmwtosrldy8istulj0 foreign key (brand_id) references `confectionery-store`.brand (brand_id), constraint FKnlk15bd7pxoutxl07ctdoh3t6 foreign key (store_id) references `confectionery-store`.store (store_id) );
